## SSOLoginOptions.onUserDuplicate property

Configures behavior when a duplicated user is detected.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onUserDuplicate?: "abort" | "merge" | "create";
```

## Remarks

This feature must be enabled in configuration, otherwise it will fail.
